ModMetaData.name: Friendship Memory Framework (v1.0.1)
ModMetaData.author: Vectorial1024
ModMetaData.description:
A framework to let Colonists remember their friends and notice missing persons.
Colonists will know deep inside their heart who went missing. How Colonists react to such information is out of scope of this framework.
- This is only a framework mod! - Requires HugsLib. Place this below HugsLib. - Safe to add to existing saves - Safe to remove from existing saves (one-time errors may exist) - Should have no problems with other mods
